Records</a></li><li class="theme-doc-sidebar-item-link theme-doc-sidebar-item-link-level-1 menu__list-item"><a class="menu__link" href="/help/faq">FAQ</a></li></ul></nav></div></div></aside><main class="docMainContainer_gTbr"><div class="container padding-top--md padding-bottom--lg"><div class="row"><div class="col docItemCol_VOVn"><div class="docItemContainer_Djhp"><article><div class="tocCollapsible_ETCw theme-doc-toc-mobile tocMobile_ITEo"><button type="button" class="clean-btn tocCollapsibleButton_TO0P">On this page</button></div><div class="theme-doc-markdown markdown"><h1>Creating a Markdown editor plugin</h1><div class="donate-links"><p><a href="https://www.paypal.com/donate/?business=E8JMYD2LQ8MMA&amp;no_recurring=0&amp;item_name=I+rely+on+donations+to+maintain+and+improve+the+Joplin+open+source+project.+Thank+you+for+your+help+-+it+makes+a+difference%21&amp;currency_code=EUR" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img loading="lazy" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/Donate-PayPal-green.svg" alt="Donate using PayPal" class="img_ev3q"></a> <a href="https://github.com/sponsors/laurent22/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img loading="lazy" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/GitHub-Badge.svg" alt="Sponsor on GitHub" class="img_ev3q"></a> <a href="https://www.patreon.com/joplin" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img loading="lazy" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/Patreon-Badge.svg" alt="Become a patron" class="img_ev3q"></a> <a href="https://joplinapp.org/donate/#donations" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img loading="lazy" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/Donate-IBAN.svg" alt="Donate using IBAN" class="img_ev3q"></a></p></div><p>This guide demonstrates how to create a Markdown editor plugin. It expects you to have first read <a href="/help/api/tutorials/toc_plugin">the table of contents tutorial</a> or have basic plugin development experience.</p><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-note alert alert--secondary admonition_LlT9"><div class="admonitionHeading_tbUL"><span class="admonitionIcon_kALy"><svg viewBox="0 0 14 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M6.3 5.69a.942.942 0 0 1-.28-.7c0-.28.09-.52.28-.7.19-.18.42-.28.7-.28.28 0 .52.09.7.28.18.19.28.42.28.7 0 .28-.09.52-.28.7a1 1 0 0 1-.7.3c-.28 0-.52-.11-.7-.3zM8 7.99c-.02-.25-.11-.48-.31-.69-.2-.19-.42-.3-.69-.31H6c-.27.02-.48.13-.69.31-.2.2-.3.44-.31.69h1v3c.02.27.11.5.31.69.2.2.42.31.69.31h1c.27 0 .48-.11.69-.31.2-.19.3-.42.31-.69H8V7.98v.01zM7 2.3c-3.14 0-5.7 2.54-5.7 5.68 0 3.14 2.56 5.7 5.7 5.7s5.7-2.55 5.7-5.7c0-3.15-2.56-5.69-5.7-5.69v.01zM7 .98c3.86 0 7 3.14 7 7s-3.14 7-7 7-7-3.12-7-7 3.14-7 7-7z"></path></svg></span>note</div><div class="admonitionContent_S0QG"><p>This guide describes how to create a plugin for Joplin&#x27;s <a href="https://codemirror.net/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CodeMirror 6</a>-based Markdown editor. The plugin created in this guide should work on both mobile and desktop. However, on Joplin desktop before version 3.1, the beta editor will need to be enabled in settings <!-- -->&gt;<!-- --> general.</p></div></div><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="setup">Setup<a href="#setup" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Setup" title="Direct link to Setup">​</a></h2><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="create-the-plugin">Create the plugin<a href="#create-the-plugin" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Create the plugin" title="Direct link to Create the plugin">​</a></h3><p>Start by <a href="/help/api/get_started/plugins">creating the plugin with <code>yo joplin</code></a>. The beta Markdown editor is still new, so make sure the <code>joplin</code> generator is up-to-date.</p><p>You should now have a directory structure similar to the following:</p><div class="language-text codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-text codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">📂 codemirror6-plugin/</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ 📂 publish/</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ 📂 api/</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ 📂 node_modules/</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ 📂 dist/</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ 📂 src/</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐   ⏐ manifest.json</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐   ⏐ index.ts</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ webpack.config.js</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ tsconfig.json</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ package-lock.json</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ README.md</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ .gitignore</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ plugin.config.json</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ .npmignore</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ GENERATOR_DOC.md</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ package.json</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="update-the-plugin-build-script">Update the plugin build script<a href="#update-the-plugin-build-script" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Update the plugin build script" title="Direct link to Update the plugin build script">​</a></h3><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-note alert alert--secondary admonition_LlT9"><div class="admonitionHeading_tbUL"><span class="admonitionIcon_kALy"><svg viewBox="0 0 14 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M6.3 5.69a.942.942 0 0 1-.28-.7c0-.28.09-.52.28-.7.19-.18.42-.28.7-.28.28 0 .52.09.7.28.18.19.28.42.28.7 0 .28-.09.52-.28.7a1 1 0 0 1-.7.3c-.28 0-.52-.11-.7-.3zM8 7.99c-.02-.25-.11-.48-.31-.69-.2-.19-.42-.3-.69-.31H6c-.27.02-.48.13-.69.31-.2.2-.3.44-.31.69h1v3c.02.27.11.5.31.69.2.2.42.31.69.31h1c.27 0 .48-.11.69-.31.2-.19.3-.42.31-.69H8V7.98v.01zM7 2.3c-3.14 0-5.7 2.54-5.7 5.68 0 3.14 2.56 5.7 5.7 5.7s5.7-2.55 5.7-5.7c0-3.15-2.56-5.69-5.7-5.69v.01zM7 .98c3.86 0 7 3.14 7 7s-3.14 7-7 7-7-3.12-7-7 3.14-7 7-7z"></path></svg></span>note</div><div class="admonitionContent_S0QG"><p>At the time of this writing, this section was necessary. If Joplin 2.14 is no longer in pre-release, you might be able to skip this section.</p></div></div><p>To create a plugin that supports the beta editor, you&#x27;ll want to update <code>webpack.config.js</code> to the latest version. Doing this allows importing CodeMirror packages without bundling additional copies of them with the plugin.</p><p>To do this, replace the contents of <code>webpack.config.js</code> with <a href="https://github.com/laurent22/joplin/blob/dev/packages/generator-joplin/generators/app/templates/webpack.config.js" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">the unreleased version of <code>webpack.config.js</code> on Joplin&#x27;s GitHub repository</a>.</p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="content-script-setup">Content script setup<a href="#content-script-setup" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Content script setup" title="Direct link to Content script setup">​</a></h2><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="create-the-content-script">Create the content script<a href="#create-the-content-script" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Create the content script" title="Direct link to Create the content script">​</a></h3><p>Now that the plugin has been created, we can create and register a CodeMirror content script.</p><p>Start by opening <code>plugin.config.json</code>.It should look similar to this:</p><div class="language-json codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-json codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token property" style="color:#36acaa">&quot;extraScripts&quot;</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">[</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">]</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>The <code>&quot;extraScripts&quot;</code> entry provides a list of TypeScript files that will be compiled <strong>in addition</strong> to <code>src/index.ts</code>. This will allow registering built versions of these files as CodeMirror or <a href="https://joplinapp.org/api/references/plugin_api/enums/contentscripttype.html#markdownitplugin" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">renderer content scripts</a>.</p><p>To add a content script, start by creating a <code>contentScript.ts</code> file in the <code>src</code> directory. Next, add the path to <code>contentScript.ts</code> to <code>extraScripts</code>:</p><div class="language-diff codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-diff codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">{</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token deleted-sign deleted prefix deleted" style="color:#d73a49">-</span><span class="token deleted-sign deleted line" style="color:#d73a49">   &quot;extraScripts&quot;: []</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token deleted-sign deleted line" style="color:#d73a49"></span><span class="token inserted-sign inserted prefix inserted" style="color:#36acaa">+</span><span class="token inserted-sign inserted line" style="color:#36acaa">   &quot;extraScripts&quot;: [&quot;contentScript.ts&quot;]</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token inserted-sign inserted line" style="color:#36acaa"></span><span class="token plain">}</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>Notice that the above path is relative to the <code>src</code> directory.</p><p>The plugin&#x27;s directory structure should now look similar to this:</p><div class="language-text codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-text codeBlock_bY9V content script<a href="#register-the-content-script" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Register the content script" title="Direct link to Register the content script">​</a></h3><p>Open <code>src/index.ts</code>. <code>contentScript.ts</code>) to be loaded as a CodeMirror plugin.</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="register-codemirror-extensions-from-the-content-script">Register CodeMirror extensions from the content script<a href="#register-codemirror-extensions-from-the-content-script" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Register CodeMirror extensions from the content script" title="Direct link to Register CodeMirror extensions from the content script">​</a></h3><p>Next, open <code>contentScript.ts</code> and add the following content:</p><div class="language-typescript codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-typescript codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// 1. class="token builtin">string</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"> postMessage</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            </span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// 2. Adds the built-in CodeMirror 6 extension to the editor</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            codeMirrorWrapper</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">addExtension</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>The above script adds <a href="https://codemirror.net/docs/ref/#view.lineNumbers" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">the built-in CodeMirror <code>lineNumbers</code> extension</a> to the editor. It&#x27;s also possible to pass an array of <a href="https://codemirror.net/docs/ref/#state.Extension" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">extension</a>s to <code>.addExtension</code>.</p><p>If you build the plugin with <code>npm install</code> or <code>npm run dist</code>, you might see the following error:</p><div class="language-console codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-console codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">bash$ npm run dist</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">...</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain" style="display:inline-block"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">ERROR in /home/builder/Documents/joplin/packages/app-cli/tests/support/plugins/cm6-test/src/contentScript.ts</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">2:28-46</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">[tsl] ERROR in /home/builder/Documents/joplin/packages/app-cli/tests/support/plugins/cm6-test/src/contentScript.ts(2,29)</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">      TS2307: Cannot find module &#x27;@codemirror/view&#x27; or its corresponding type declarations.</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>At present, TypeScript can&#x27;t find type information for <code>@codemirror/view</code>. To fix this, run <code>npm install --save-dev @codemirror/view</code> in the plugin&#x27;s base directory:</p><div class="codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-text codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">$ cd path/to/codemirror6-plugin/</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">$ npm install --save-dev @codemirror/view</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-note alert alert--secondary admonition_LlT9"><div class="admonitionHeading_tbUL"><span class="admonitionIcon_kALy"><svg viewBox="0 0 14 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M6.3 5.69a.942.942 0 0 1-.28-.7c0-.28.09-.52.28-.7.19-.18.42-.28.7-.28.28 0 .52.09.7.28.18.19.28.42.28.7 0 .28-.09.52-.28.7a1 1 0 0 1-.7.3c-.28 0-.52-.11-.7-.3zM8 7.99c-.02-.25-.11-.48-.31-.69-.2-.19-.42-.3-.69-.31H6c-.27.02-.48.13-.69.31-.2.2-.3.44-.31.69h1v3c.02.27.11.5.31.69.2.2.42.31.69.31h1c.27 0 .48-.11.69-.31.2-.19.3-.42.31-.69H8V7.98v.01zM7 2.3c-3.14 0-5.7 2.54-5.7 5.68 0 3.14 2.56 5.7 5.7 5.7s5.7-2.55 5.7-5.7c0-3.15-2.56-5.69-5.7-5.69v.01zM7 .98c3.86 0 7 3.14 7 7s-3.14 7-7 7-7-3.12-7-7 3.14-7 7-7z"></path></svg></span>note</div><div class="admonitionContent_S0QG"><p>The default <code>webpack.config.js</code> tells Webpack not to bundle several packages, including <code>@codemirror/view</code>. As such, the <code>@codemirror/view</code> plugin is used <strong>only for type information</strong>.</p><p>This is what we want. If <code>@codemirror/view</code> is bundled with the plugin, it could conflict with the version of <code>@codemirror/view</code> used by Joplin. In general, CodeMirror packages can break if multiple copies of the same package try to use the same editor. This is also why a <a href="#update-the-plugin-build-script">newer version of <code>webpack.config.js</code></a> is required to build the plugin.</p></div></div><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="try-it">Try it!<a href="#try-it" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Try it!" title="Direct link to Try it!">​</a></h3><p>We now have an extension that adds line numbers to Joplin&#x27;s markdown editor.</p><p>To try it,</p><ol><li>Open Joplin.</li><li>Open &quot;Options&quot;, then &quot;Plugins&quot;.</li><li>Click &quot;Show Advanced Settings&quot;</li><li>Enter the path to the <code>codemirror6-plugin</code> directory into the &quot;Development plugins&quot; box.</li><li>Open the &quot;General&quot; tab and make sure &quot;opt in to the editor beta&quot; is checked.</li><li>Restart Joplin.<ul><li>Make sure Joplin closes completely before opening it again. On Windows/Linux, this can be done by closing Joplin with <code>File</code> <!-- -->&gt;<!-- --> <code>Quit</code>.</li></ul></li></ol><p>Your editor should now have line numbers!</p><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-info alert alert--info admonition_LlT9"><div class="admonitionHeading_tbUL"><span class="admonitionIcon_kALy"><svg viewBox="0 0 14 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7 2.3c3.14 0 5.7 2.56 5.7 5.7s-2.56 5.7-5.7 5.7A5.71 5.71 0 0 1 1.3 8c0-3.14 2.56-5.7 5.7-5.7zM7 1C3.14 1 0 4.14 0 8s3.14 7 7 7 7-3.14 7-7-3.14-7-7-7zm1 3H6v5h2V4zm0 6H6v2h2v-2z"></path></svg></span>info</div><div class="admonitionContent_S0QG"><p>If the plugin fails to load, you might see an error similar to the following in Joplin&#x27;s development tools (<code>Help</code> <!-- -->&gt;<!-- --> <code>Toggle development tools</code>):</p><div class="codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-text codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">Error: Unrecognized extension value in extension set (function(t={}){return[kn.of(t),gn(),An]}). This sometimes happens because multiple instances of @codemirror/state are loaded, breaking instanceof checks.</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>If you do, be sure to follow the <a href="#update-the-plugin-build-script">steps in the &quot;Update the Plugin Build Script&quot;</a> section. If that section doesn&#x27;t help, change</p><div class="language-typescript codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-typescript codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>to</p><div class="language-typescript codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-typescript codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code id="connect-to-the-main-script">Connect to the main script<a href="#connect-to-the-main-script" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Connect to the main script" title="Direct link to Connect to the main script">​</a></h2><p>Next, we&#x27;ll see how to communicate between the plugin&#x27;s main script and the editor. We&#x27;ll do this using <a href="https://joplinapp.org/api/references/plugin_api/classes/joplincontentscripts.html#onmessage" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><code>joplin.contentScripts.onMessage</code></a> and <code>context.postMessage</code>.</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="register-a-setting">Register a setting<a href="#register-a-setting" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Register a setting" title="Direct link to Register a setting">​</a></h3><p>Let&#x27;s start by registering a setting.</p><p>Open <code>index.ts</code> and, near the top of the file, create a new function, <code>registerSettings.ts</code>:</p><div class="language-typescript codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-typescript codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>The call to <a href="https://joplinapp.org/api/references/plugin_api/classes/joplinsettings.html#registersection" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><code>joplin.settings.registerSection</code></a> creates a new section in Joplin&#x27;s settings. This is where we&#x27;ll put new settings.</p><p>As before, <code>icon</code> can be any <a href="https://fontawesome.com/v5/search?q=edit&amp;o=r&amp;m=free" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">FontAwesome 5 Free</a> icon name. The <code>description</code> property is an optional extended description to be shown at the top of our settings page.</p><p>Next, let&#x27;s register a setting.</p><p>Add a new <code>highlightLineSettingId</code> constant to the top of <code>index.ts</code>. Then, register a setting with <code>highlightLineSettingId</code> as its ID using <a href="https://joplinapp.org/api/references/plugin_api/classes/joplinsettings.html#registersetting" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><code>joplin.settings.registerSettings</code></a>:</p><div class="language-typescript codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-typescript codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            value</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token boolean" style="color:#36acaa">true</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// Default value</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">public</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token boolean" style="color:#36acaa">true</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// Show in the settings screen</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            type</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> SettingItemType</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token plain">Bool</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            label</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;Highlight active line&#x27;</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// ...</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" can get and set settings in the plugin&#x27;s main script (<code>src/index.ts</code>), but not directly in the plugin&#x27;s content script.</p><details class="details_lb9f alert alert--info id="create-an-onmessage-listener-that-returns-the-setting-value">Create an <code>onMessage</code> listener that returns the setting value<a href="#create-an-onmessage-listener-that-returns-the-setting-value" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to create-an-onmessage-listener-that-returns-the-setting-value" title="Direct link to create-an-onmessage-listener-that-returns-the-setting-value">​</a></h3><p>Create a new <code>registerMessageListener</code> function, just above <code>joplin.plugins.register({</code>. In this function, register an <code>onMessage</code> listener with <a href="https://joplinapp.org/api/references/plugin_api/classes/joplincontentscripts.html#onmessage" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><code>joplin.contentScripts.onMessage</code></a>. We&#x27;ll listen for the <code>getSettings</code> message and return an object with the plugin&#x27;s current settings:</p><div class="language-typescript codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-typescript codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// ... in index.ts ...</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// ...hidden...</span><span style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// Add this:</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span from the content script with `contentScriptId`</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">async</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token plain">message</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token builtin">any</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=&gt;</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">                    highlightActiveLine</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> settingValue</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">                </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain" </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">async</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">function</span><span class="token punctuation"     </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">await</span><span class="token plain"> joplin</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-the-setting-from-the-content-script">Get the setting from the content script<a href="#get-the-setting-from-the-content-script" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Get the setting from the content script" title="Direct link to Get the setting from the content script">​</a></h3><p>Open <code>contentScript.ts</code> and update it with the following:</p><div class="language-typescript codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre          </span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// Get settings from the main script with postMessage:</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token plain">highlightActiveLine</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">                codeMirrorWrapper</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">addExtension</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>Above, we get settings from <code>index.ts</code> with <code>context.postMessage(&#x27;getSettings&#x27;)</code>. This calls the <code>onMessage</code> listener that was registered earlier. Its return value is stored in the <code>settings</code> variable.</p><p>Note that <a href="https://codemirror.net/docs/ref/#view.highlightActiveLine" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><code>highlightActiveLine</code></a> is another built-in CodeMirror extension. It adds the <code>cm-activeLine</code> class to all lines that have a cursor on them.</p><details class="details_lb9f alert alert--info details_b_Ee" data-collapsed="true"><summary>Alternative approach to getting settings: Registering an editor command</summary><div><div class="collapsibleContent_i85q"><p>Above, we use <code>postMessage</code> and <code>onMessage</code> to access settings.</p><p>An alternative way to do this would be to register an editor command with code similar to the following:</p><div class="language-typescript codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-typescript codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// You may need to add @codemirror/state to package.json</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">import</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"> Compartment </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">from</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;@codemirror/state&#x27;</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain" style="display:inline-block"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// ...</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain" style="display:inline-block"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token function-variable function" style="color:#d73a49">plugin</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">async</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token plain">codeMirrorWrapper</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token builtin">any</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=&gt;</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// See https://codemirror.net/examples/config/#compartments</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">const</span><span class="token plain"> highlightExtension </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">new</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token class-name">Compartment</span><span class="token punctuation" plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        codeMirrorWrapper</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">addExtension</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token plain">highlightExtension</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">of</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">[</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">]</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain" style="display:inline-block"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// Registers a command with name &quot;myExtension__setHighlightActiveLine&quot; that can be</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// called from the main plugin script with joplin.commands.execute(&#x27;editor.execCommand&#x27;, ...).</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        codeMirrorWrapper</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">registerCommand</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;myExtension__setHighlightActiveLine&#x27;</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token plain">highlighted</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token builtin">boolean</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=&gt;</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">const</span><span class="token plain"> extension </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain"> highlighted </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">?</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">[</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">highlightActiveLine</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">]</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">[</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">]</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            codeMirrorWrapper</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token plain">editor</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">dispatch</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">                effects</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">[</span><span class="token plain"> highlightExtension</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">reconfigure</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token plain">extension</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">]</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>In <code>index.ts</code>, we could then call the following function <a href="https://joplinapp.org/api/references/plugin_api/classes/joplinsettings.html#onchange" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">when the plugin&#x27;s settings change</a> and after the content script loads:</p><div class="language-typescript codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-typescript codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">const</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token function-variable function" style="color:#d73a49">updateContentScriptSettings</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">async</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token operator" plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        args</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div></div></div></details><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="style-the-active-line">Style the active line<a href="#style-the-active-line" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Style the active line" title="Direct link to Style the active line">​</a></h3><p>If you run the plugin, you might notice that the active line has a blue background. Let&#x27;s customise it with CSS!</p><p>There are two different ways of doing this: With a <code>.css</code> file and with a <a href="https://codemirror.net/examples/styling/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CodeMirror theme</a>. In this tutorial, we&#x27;ll use a <code>.css</code> file.</p><p>Create a new <code>style.css</code> file within the <code>src</code> directory. Set its content to</p><div class="language-css codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-css codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token selector class" style="color:#00009f">.cm-editor</span><span class="token selector" style="color:#00009f"> </span><span class="token selector class" style="color:#00009f">.cm-line</span><span class="token selector class" style="color:#00009f">.cm-activeLine</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span more information about styling with plugins */</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token property" style="color:#36acaa">color</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token function" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token property" style="color:#36acaa">background-color</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token color function" style="color:#d73a49">rgba</span><span class="token color punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token color number" style="color:#36acaa">0.4</span><span class="token color punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>Next, load the CSS file from the CodeMirror content script:</p><div class="language-typescript codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-typescript codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=&gt;</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">return</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">[</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"> name</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;./style.css&#x27;</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">]</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>The active line should now have a light-yellow background, but only when the &quot;highlight active line&quot; setting is enabled.</p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="codemirror-5-compatibility">CodeMirror 5 compatibility<a href="#codemirror-5-compatibility" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to CodeMirror 5 compatibility" title="Direct link to CodeMirror 5 compatibility">​</a></h2><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-note alert alert--secondary admonition_LlT9"><div class="admonitionHeading_tbUL"><span class="admonitionIcon_kALy"><svg viewBox="0 0 14 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M6.3 5.69a.942.942 0 0 1-.28-.7c0-.28.09-.52.28-.7.19-.18.42-.28.7-.28.28 0 .52.09.7.28.18.19.28.42.28.7 0 .28-.09.52-.28.7a1 1 0 0 1-.7.3c-.28 0-.52-.11-.7-.3zM8 7.99c-.02-.25-.11-.48-.31-.69-.2-.19-.42-.3-.69-.31H6c-.27.02-.48.13-.69.31-.2.2-.3.44-.31.69h1v3c.02.27.11.5.31.69.2.2.42.31.69.31h1c.27 0 .48-.11.69-.31.2-.19.3-.42.31-.69H8V7.98v.01zM7 2.3c-3.14 0-5.7 2.54-5.7 5.68 0 3.14 2.56 5.7 5.7 5.7s5.7-2.55 5.7-5.7c0-3.15-2.56-5.69-5.7-5.69v.01zM7 .98c3.86 0 7 3.14 7 7s-3.14 7-7 7-7-3.12-7-7 3.14-7 7-7z"></path></svg></span>note</div><div class="admonitionContent_S0QG"><p>As of Joplin v2.14 we recommend that you create CodeMirror 6-based plugins. If you still need to support older versions of Joplin, you can target both CodeMirror 5 and CodeMirror 6. Follow the tutorial below for information on how to do this.</p></div></div><p>Joplin&#x27;s legacy markdown editor uses <a href="https://codemirror.net/5/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CodeMirror 5</a>. The beta editor uses CodeMirror 6.</p><p>Unfortunately, the <a href="https://codemirror.net/5/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CodeMirror 5 API</a> and <a href="https://codemirror.net/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CodeMirror 6 API</a>s are very different. As such, you&#x27;ll likely need two different content scripts — one for CodeMirror 5 and one for CodeMirror 6. <a href="https://github.com/roman-r-m/joplin-plugin-quick-links/pull/15/files#diff-a19ae4175adf4e5173549901c8535f2a45278f8a907da485899660c08c1c520b" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">This pull request</a> provides an example of how CodeMirror 6 support might be added to an existing plugin.</p><p>To add CodeMirror 5 compatibility to our CodeMirror 6 plugin, we&#x27;ll:</p><ol><li>Create another content script for CodeMirror 5. Use only <a href="https://codemirror.net/5/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CodeMirror 5 APIs</a>.</li><li>Within the <code>plugin</code> function, check whether <code>codeMirrorWrapper</code> is actually a CodeMirror 5 editor. This can be done by checking whether <code>codeMirrorWrapper.cm6</code> is defined. (If it is, it&#x27;s a reference to a CodeMirror 6 <code>EditorView</code>).</li><li>If <code>codeMirrorWrapper.cm6</code> is defined, only load the CodeMirror 5 content script. Otherwise, only load the CodeMirror 6 content script.</li></ol><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="create-a-content-script-for-codemirror-5">Create a content script for CodeMirror 5<a href="#create-a-content-script-for-codemirror-5" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Create a content script for CodeMirror 5" title="Direct link to Create a content script for CodeMirror 5">​</a></h3><p>For organisational purposes, make a new folder, <code>src/contentScripts</code>. Next, move the existing <code>contentScript.ts</code> to <code>src/contentScripts/codeMirror6.ts</code> and create a new <code>contentScripts/codeMirror5.ts</code> file.</p><p>You should now have the following folder structure:</p><div class="language-text codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-text codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">📂 codemirror6-plugin/</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ 📂 publish/</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ 📂 api/</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ 📂 node_modules/</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ 📂 dist/</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ 📂 src/</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐   ⏐ 📂 contentScripts/</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐   ⏐  ⏐  codeMirror6.ts</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐   ⏐  ⏐  codeMirror5.ts</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐   ⏐ manifest.json</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐   ⏐ index.ts</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ plugin.config.json</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  ⏐ ...</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>For now, let <code>src/contentScripts/codeMirror5.ts</code>&#x27;s content be the same as the original CodeMirror 6 content script.</p><p>Next, update <code>plugin.config.json</code> so that both content scripts are compiled by Webpack:</p><div class="language-json codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-json codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">[</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">]</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="register-the-content-script-1">Register plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">]</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain" style="display:inline-block"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token function-variable function" style="color:#d73a49">assets</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=&gt;</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">return</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">[</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"> name</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;./style.css&#x27;</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">]</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-warning alert alert--danger admonition_LlT9"><div class="admonitionHeading_tbUL"><span class="admonitionIcon_kALy"><svg viewBox="0 0 12 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M5.05.31c.81 2.17.41 3.38-.52 4.31C3.55 5.67 1.98 6.45.9 7.98c-1.45 2.05-1.7 6.53 3.53 7.7-2.2-1.16-2.67-4.52-.3-6.61-.61 2.03.53 3.33 1.94 2.86 1.39-.47 2.3.53 2.27 1.67-.02.78-.31 1.44-1.13 1.81 3.42-.59 4.78-3.42 4.78-5.56 0-2.84-2.53-3.22-1.25-5.61-1.52.13-2.03 1.13-1.89 2.75.09 1.08-1.02 1.8-1.86 1.33-.67-.41-.66-1.19-.06-1.78C8.18 5.31 8.68 2.45 5.05.32L5.03.3l.02.01z"></path></svg></span>danger</div><div class="admonitionContent_S0QG"><p>Although Joplin does provide a limited CodeMirror 5 compatibility layer in the CodeMirror 6 editor, in the future, <strong>new plugins will be unable to use this compatibility layer</strong>.</p></div></div><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="make-the-codemirror-6-content-script-only-load-in-codemirror-6">Make the CodeMirror 6 content script only load in CodeMirror 6<a href="#make-the-codemirror-6-content-script-only-load-in-codemirror-6" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Make the CodeMirror 6 content script only load in CodeMirror 6" title="Direct link to Make the CodeMirror 6 content script only load in CodeMirror 6">​</a></h3><p>At the beginning of <code>contentScripts/codeMirror6.ts</code>&#x27;s <code>plugin</code> function, add:</p><div class="language-typescript codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-typescript codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">if</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">!</span><span class="token plain">codeMirrorWrapper</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token plain">cm6</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">return</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="summary">Summary<a href="#summary" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Summary" title="Direct link to Summary">​</a></h3><p>To support both CodeMirror 5 and CodeMirror 6, we register two content scripts. One will fail to load in CodeMirror 5 and the other we disable in CodeMirror 6.</p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="see-also">See also<a href="#see-also" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to See also" title="Direct link to See also">​</a></h2><ul><li><a found on GitHub</a></li><li><a href="https://codemirror.net/5/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CodeMirror 5 API documentation</a></li><li><a href="https://codemirror.net/" target="_blank"
