docItemCol_VOVn"><div class="docItemContainer_Djhp"><article><div class="tocCollapsible_ETCw theme-doc-toc-mobile tocMobile_ITEo"><button type="button" class="clean-btn tocCollapsibleButton_TO0P">On this page</button></div><div class="theme-doc-markdown markdown"><h1>Joplin Data API</h1><div class="donate-links"><p><a href="https://www.paypal.com/donate/?business=E8JMYD2LQ8MMA&amp;no_recurring=0&amp;item_name=I+rely+on+donations+to+maintain+and+improve+the+Joplin+open+source+project.+Thank+you+for+your+help+-+it+makes+a+difference%21&amp;currency_code=EUR" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img loading="lazy" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/Donate-PayPal-green.svg" alt="Donate using PayPal" class="img_ev3q"></a> <a href="https://github.com/sponsors/laurent22/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img loading="lazy" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/GitHub-Badge.svg" alt="Sponsor on GitHub" class="img_ev3q"></a> <a href="https://www.patreon.com/joplin" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img loading="lazy" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/Patreon-Badge.svg" alt="Become a patron" class="img_ev3q"></a> <a href="https://joplinapp.org/donate/#donations" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img loading="lazy" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/Donate-IBAN.svg" alt="Donate using IBAN" class="img_ev3q"></a></p></div><p>This API is available when the clipper server is running. It provides access to the notes, notebooks, tags and other Joplin object via a REST API. Plugins can also access this API even when the clipper server is not running.</p><p>In order to use it, you&#x27;ll first need to find on which port the service is running. To do so, open the Web Clipper Options in Joplin and if the service is running it should tell you on which port. Normally it runs on port <strong>41184</strong>. If you want to find it programmatically, you may follow this kind of algorithm:</p><div class="language-javascript codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-javascript codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">let</span><span class="token plain"> port </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token keyword null nil" style="color:#00009f">null</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token keyword control-flow" style="color:#00009f">for</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">let</span><span class="token plain"> portToTest </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token number" style="color:#36acaa">41184</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"> portToTest </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">&lt;=</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token number" style="color:#36acaa">41194</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"> portToTest</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">++</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">const</span><span class="token plain"> result </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">pingPort</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token plain">portToTest</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// Call GET /ping</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token keyword control-flow" style="color:#00009f">if</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token plain">result </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">==</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;JoplinClipperServer&#x27;</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        port </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain"> portToTest</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// Found the port</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token keyword control-flow" style="color:#00009f">break</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="authorisation">Authorisation<a href="#authorisation" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Authorisation" title="Direct link to Authorisation">​</a></h2><p>To prevent unauthorised applications from accessing the API, the calls must be authenticated. To do so, you must provide a token as a query parameter for each API call. You can get this token from the Joplin desktop application, on the Web Clipper Options screen.</p><p>This would be an example of valid cURL call using a token:</p><div class="language-shell codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-shell codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">curl</span><span class="token plain"> http://localhost:41184/notes?token</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain">ABCD123ABCD123ABCD123ABCD123ABCD123</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>In the documentation below, the token will not be specified every time however you will need to include it.</p><p>If needed you may also <a href="/help/dev/spec/clipper_auth">request the token programmatically</a></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="using-the-api">Using the API<a href="#using-the-api" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Using the API" title="Direct link to Using the API">​</a></h2><p>All the calls, unless noted otherwise, receives and send <strong>JSON data</strong>. For example to create a new note:</p><div class="language-shell codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-shell codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">curl</span><span class="token plain"> --data </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;{ &quot;title&quot;: &quot;My note&quot;, &quot;body&quot;: &quot;Some note in **Markdown**&quot;}&#x27;</span><span class="token plain"> http://localhost:41184/notes</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>In the documentation below, the calls may include special parameters such as :id or :note_id. You would replace this with the item ID or note ID.</p><p>For example, for the endpoint <code>DELETE /tags/:id/notes/:note_id</code>, to remove the tag with ID &quot;ABCD1234&quot; from the note with ID &quot;EFGH789&quot;, you would run for example:</p><div class="language-shell codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-shell codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">curl</span><span class="token plain"> -X DELETE http://localhost:41184/tags/ABCD1234/notes/EFGH789</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>The four verbs supported by the API are the following ones:</p><ul><li><strong>GET</strong>: To retrieve items (notes, notebooks, etc.).</li><li><strong>POST</strong>: To create new items. In general most item properties are optional. If you omit any, a default value will be used.</li><li><strong>PUT</strong>: To update an item. Note in a REST API, traditionally PUT is used to completely replace an item, however in this API it will only replace the properties that are provided. For example if you PUT {&quot;title&quot;: &quot;my new title&quot;}, only the &quot;title&quot; property will be changed. The other properties will be left untouched (they won&#x27;t be cleared nor changed).</li><li><strong>DELETE</strong>: To delete items.</li></ul><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="filtering-data">Filtering data<a href="#filtering-data" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Filtering data" title="Direct link to Filtering data">​</a></h2><p>You can change the fields that will be returned by the API using the <code>fields=</code> query parameter, which takes a list of comma separated fields. For example, to get the longitude and latitude of a note, use this:</p><div class="language-shell codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-shell codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">curl</span><span class="token plain"> http://localhost:41184/notes/ABCD123?fields</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain">longitude,latitude</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>To get the IDs only of all the tags:</p><div class="language-shell codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-shell codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">curl</span><span class="token plain"> http://localhost:41184/tags?fields</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain">id</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>By default API results will contain the following fields: <strong>id</strong>, <strong>parent_id</strong>, <strong>title</strong></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="pagination">Pagination<a href="#pagination" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Pagination" title="Direct link to Pagination">​</a></h2><p>All API calls that return multiple results will be paginated and will return the following structure:</p><table><thead><tr><th>Key</th><th>Always present?</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><code>items</code></td><td>Yes</td><td>The array of items you have requested.</td></tr><tr><td><code>has_more</code></td><td>Yes</td><td>If <code>true</code>, there are more items after this page. If <code>false</code>, it means you have reached the end of the data set.</td></tr></tbody></table><p>You can specify how the results should be sorted using the <code>order_by</code> and <code>order_dir</code> query parameters, and which page to retrieve using the <code>page</code> parameter (starts at and defaults to 1). You can specify the number of items to be returned using the <code>limit</code> parameter (the maximum being 100 items).</p><p>The following call for example will initiate a request to fetch all the notes, 10 at a time, and sorted by &quot;updated_time&quot; ascending:</p><div class="language-shell codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-shell codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">curl</span><span class="token plain"> http://localhost:41184/notes?order_by</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain">updated_time</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">&amp;</span><span class="token assign-left variable" style="color:#36acaa">order_dir</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain">ASC</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">&amp;</span><span class="token assign-left variable" style="color:#36acaa">limit</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token number" style="color:#36acaa">10</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>This will return a result like this</p><div class="language-json codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-json codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token property" style="color:#36acaa">&quot;items&quot;</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">[</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">/* 10 notes */</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">]</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token property" style="color:#36acaa">&quot;has_more&quot;</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token boolean" style="color:#36acaa">true</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>Then you will resume fetching the results using this query:</p><div class="language-shell codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-shell codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">curl</span><span class="token plain"> http://localhost:41184/notes?order_by</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain">updated_time</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">&amp;</span><span class="token assign-left variable" style="color:#36acaa">order_dir</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain">ASC</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">&amp;</span><span class="token assign-left variable" style="color:#36acaa">limit</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token number" style="color:#36acaa">10</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">&amp;</span><span class="token assign-left variable" style="color:#36acaa">page</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token number" style="color:#36acaa">2</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>Eventually you will get some results that do not contain an &quot;has_more&quot; parameter, at which point you will have retrieved all the results</p><p>As an example the pseudo-code below could be used to fetch all the notes:</p><div class="language-javascript codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-javascript codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain" style="display:inline-block"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">async</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token keyword" class="token plain">url</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token method function property-access" style="color:#d73a49">json</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain" style="display:inline-block"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">async</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">function</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">fetchAllNotes</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">let</span><span class="token plain"> pageNum </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token number" style="color:#36acaa">1</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token keyword control-flow" style="color:#00009f">do</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token keyword" style="color:#00009f">const</span><span class="token plain"> response </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token keyword control-flow" style="color:#00009f">await</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">fetchJson</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token plain">http</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">/</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">/</span><span class="token plain">localhost</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token number" style="color:#36acaa">41184</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">/</span><span class="token plain">notes</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">?</span><span class="token plain">page</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">=</span><span class="token plain">&#x27; </span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">+</span><span class="token plain"> pageNum</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">++</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token console class-name">console</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token method function property-access" style="color:#d73a49">info</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;Printing notes:&#x27;</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"> response</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token property-access">items</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token keyword control-flow" style="color:#00009f">while</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token plain">response</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token property-access">has_more</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="error-handling">Error handling<a href="#error-handling" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Error handling" title="Direct link to Error handling">​</a></h2><p>In case of an error, an HTTP status code <!-- -->&gt;<!-- -->= 400 will be returned along with a JSON object that provides more info about the error. The JSON object is in the format <code>{ &quot;error&quot;: &quot;description of error&quot; }</code>.</p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="about-the-property-types">About the property types<a href="#about-the-property-types" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to About the property types" title="Direct link to About the property types">​</a></h2><ul><li>Text is UTF-8.</li><li>All date/time are Unix timestamps in milliseconds.</li><li>Booleans are integer values 0 or 1.</li></ul><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="testing-if-the-service-is-available">Testing if the service is available<a href="#testing-if-the-service-is-available" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Testing if the service is available" title="Direct link to Testing if the service is available">​</a></h2><p>Call <strong>GET /ping</strong> to check if the service is available. It should return &quot;JoplinClipperServer&quot; if it works.</p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="searching">Searching<a href="#searching" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Searching" title="Direct link to Searching">​</a></h2><p>Call <strong>GET /search?query=YOUR_QUERY</strong> to search for notes. This end-point supports the <code>field</code> parameter which is recommended to use so that you only get the data that you need. The query syntax is as described in the main documentation: <a href="https://joplinapp.org/help/apps/search" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://joplinapp.org/help/apps/search</a></p><p>To retrieve non-notes items, such as notebooks or tags, add a <code>type</code> parameter and set it to the required <a href="#item-type-ids">item type name</a>. In that case, full text search will not be used - instead it will be a simple case-insensitive search. You can also use <code>*</code> as a wildcard. This is convenient for example to retrieve notebooks or tags by title.</p><p>For example, to retrieve the notebook named <code>recipes</code>: <strong>GET /search?query=recipes&amp;type=folder</strong></p><p>To retrieve all the tags that start with <code>project-</code>: <strong>GET /search?query=project-*&amp;type=tag</strong></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="item-type-ids">Item type IDs<a href="#item-type-ids" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Item type IDs" title="Direct link to Item type IDs">​</a></h2><p>Item type IDs might be referred to in certain objects you will retrieve from the API. This is the correspondence between name and ID:</p><table><thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Value</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>note</td><td>1</td></tr><tr><td>folder</td><td>2</td></tr><tr><td>setting</td><td>3</td></tr><tr><td>resource</td><td>4</td></tr><tr><td>tag</td><td>5</td></tr><tr><td>note_tag</td><td>6</td></tr><tr><td>search</td><td>7</td></tr><tr><td>alarm</td><td>8</td></tr><tr><td>master_key</td><td>9</td></tr><tr><td>item_change</td><td>10</td></tr><tr><td>note_resource</td><td>11</td></tr><tr><td>resource_local_state</td><td>12</td></tr><tr><td>revision</td><td>13</td></tr><tr><td>migration</td><td>14</td></tr><tr><td>smart_filter</td><td>15</td></tr><tr><td>command</td><td>16</td></tr></tbody></table><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="notes">Notes<a href="#notes" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Notes" title="Direct link to Notes">​</a></h2><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="properties">Properties<a href="#properties" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Properties" title="Direct link to Properties">​</a></h3><table><thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Type</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>id</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>parent_id</td><td>text</td><td>ID of the notebook that contains this note. Change this ID to move the note to a different notebook.</td></tr><tr><td>title</td><td>text</td><td>The note title.</td></tr><tr><td>body</td><td>text</td><td>The note body, in Markdown. May also contain HTML.</td></tr><tr><td>created_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the note was created.</td></tr><tr><td>updated_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the note was last updated.</td></tr><tr><td>is_conflict</td><td>int</td><td>Tells whether the note is a conflict or not.</td></tr><tr><td>latitude</td><td>numeric</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>longitude</td><td>numeric</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>altitude</td><td>numeric</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>author</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>source_url</td><td>text</td><td>The full URL where the note comes from.</td></tr><tr><td>is_todo</td><td>int</td><td>Tells whether this note is a todo or not.</td></tr><tr><td>todo_due</td><td>int</td><td>When the todo is due. An alarm will be triggered on that date.</td></tr><tr><td>todo_completed</td><td>int</td><td>Tells whether todo is completed or not. This is a timestamp in milliseconds.</td></tr><tr><td>source</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>source_application</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>application_data</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>order</td><td>numeric</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>user_created_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the note was created. It may differ from created_time as it can be manually set by the user.</td></tr><tr><td>user_updated_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the note was last updated. It may differ from updated_time as it can be manually set by the user.</td></tr><tr><td>encryption_cipher_text</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>encryption_applied</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>markup_language</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>is_shared</td><td>int</td><td>Whether the note is published.</td></tr><tr><td>share_id</td><td>text</td><td>The ID of the Joplin Server/Cloud share containing the note. Empty if not shared.</td></tr><tr><td>conflict_original_id</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>master_key_id</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>user_data</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>deleted_time</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>body_html</td><td>text</td><td>Note body, in HTML format</td></tr><tr><td>base_url</td><td>text</td><td>If <code>body_html</code> is provided and contains relative URLs, provide the <code>base_url</code> parameter too so that all the URLs can be converted to absolute ones. The base URL is basically where the HTML was fetched from, minus the query (everything after the &#x27;?&#x27;). For example if the original page was <code>https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%5Bjava%5D+test</code>, the base URL is <code>https://stackoverflow.com/search</code>.</td></tr><tr><td>image_data_url</td><td>text</td><td>An image to attach to the note, in <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Basics_of_HTTP/Data_URIs" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Data URL</a> format.</td></tr><tr><td>crop_rect</td><td>text</td><td>If an image is provided, you can also specify an optional rectangle that will be used to crop the image. In format <code>{ x: x, y: y, width: width, height: height }</code></td></tr></tbody></table><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-notes">GET /notes<a href="#get-notes" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /notes" title="Direct link to GET /notes">​</a></h3><p>Gets all notes</p><p>By default, this call will return the all notes <strong>except</strong> the notes in the trash folder and any conflict note. To include these too, you can specify <code>include_deleted=1</code> and <code>include_conflicts=1</code> as query parameters.</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-notesid">GET /notes/:id<a href="#get-notesid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /notes/:id" title="Direct link to GET /notes/:id">​</a></h3><p>Gets note with ID :id</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-notesidtags">GET /notes/:id/tags<a href="#get-notesidtags" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /notes/:id/tags" title="Direct link to GET /notes/:id/tags">​</a></h3><p>Gets all the tags attached to this note.</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-notesidresources">GET /notes/:id/resources<a href="#get-notesidresources" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /notes/:id/resources" title="Direct link to GET /notes/:id/resources">​</a></h3><p>Gets all the resources attached to this note.</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="post-notes">POST /notes<a href="#post-notes" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to POST /notes" title="Direct link to POST /notes">​</a></h3><p>Creates a new note</p><p>You can either specify the note body as Markdown by setting the <code>body</code> parameter, or in HTML by setting the <code>body_html</code>.</p><p>Examples:</p><ul><li>Create a note from some Markdown text</li></ul><div class="language-shell codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-shell codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">curl</span><span class="token plain"> --data </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;{ &quot;title&quot;: &quot;My note&quot;, &quot;body&quot;: &quot;Some note in **Markdown**&quot;}&#x27;</span><span class="token plain"> http://127.0.0.1:41184/notes</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><ul><li>Create a note from some HTML</li></ul><div class="language-shell codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-shell codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">curl</span><span class="token plain"> --data </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;{ &quot;title&quot;: &quot;My note&quot;, &quot;body_html&quot;: &quot;Some note in &lt;b&gt;HTML&lt;/b&gt;&quot;}&#x27;</span><span class="token plain"> http://127.0.0.1:41184/notes</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><ul><li>Create a note and attach an image to it:</li></ul><div class="language-shell codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-shell codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">curl</span><span class="token plain"> --data </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;{ &quot;title&quot;: &quot;Image test&quot;, &quot;body&quot;: &quot;Here is Joplin icon:&quot;, &quot;image_data_url&quot;: &quot;data:image/png;base64,&quot;}&#x27;</span><span class="token plain"> http://127.0.0.1:41184/notes</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><h4 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="creating-a-note-with-a-specific-id">Creating a note with a specific ID<a href="#creating-a-note-with-a-specific-id" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Creating a note with a specific ID" title="Direct link to Creating a note with a specific ID">​</a></h4><p>When a new note is created, it is automatically assigned a new unique ID so <strong>normally you do not need to set the ID</strong>. However, if for some reason you want to set it, you can supply it as the <code>id</code> property. It needs to be a <strong>32 characters long string</strong> in hexadecimal. <strong>Make sure it is unique</strong>, for example by generating it using whatever GUID function is available in your programming language.</p><div class="language-shell codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-shell codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">curl</span><span class="token plain"> --data </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;{ &quot;id&quot;: &quot;00a87474082744c1a8515da6aa5792d2&quot;, &quot;title&quot;: &quot;My note with custom ID&quot;}&#x27;</span><span class="token plain"> http://127.0.0.1:41184/notes</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="put-notesid">PUT /notes/:id<a href="#put-notesid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to PUT /notes/:id" title="Direct link to PUT /notes/:id">​</a></h3><p>Sets the properties of the note with ID :id</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="delete-notesid">DELETE /notes/:id<a href="#delete-notesid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to DELETE /notes/:id" title="Direct link to DELETE /notes/:id">​</a></h3><p>Deletes the note with ID :id</p><p>By default, the note will be moved <strong>to the trash</strong>. To permanently delete it, add the query parameter <code>permanent=1</code></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="folders">Folders<a href="#folders" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Folders" title="Direct link to Folders">​</a></h2><p>This is actually a notebook. Internally notebooks are called &quot;folders&quot;.</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="properties-1">Properties<a href="#properties-1" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Properties" title="Direct link to Properties">​</a></h3><table><thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Type</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>id</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>title</td><td>text</td><td>The folder title.</td></tr><tr><td>created_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the folder was created.</td></tr><tr><td>updated_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the folder was last updated.</td></tr><tr><td>user_created_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the folder was created. It may differ from created_time as it can be manually set by the user.</td></tr><tr><td>user_updated_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the folder was last updated. It may differ from updated_time as it can be manually set by the user.</td></tr><tr><td>encryption_cipher_text</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>encryption_applied</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>parent_id</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>is_shared</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>share_id</td><td>text</td><td>The ID of the Joplin Server/Cloud share containing the folder. Empty if not shared.</td></tr><tr><td>master_key_id</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>icon</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>user_data</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>deleted_time</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr></tbody></table><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-folders">GET /folders<a href="#get-folders" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /folders" title="Direct link to GET /folders">​</a></h3><p>Gets all folders</p><p>The folders are returned as a tree. The sub-notebooks of a notebook, if any, are under the <code>children</code> key.</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-foldersid">GET /folders/:id<a href="#get-foldersid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /folders/:id" title="Direct link to GET /folders/:id">​</a></h3><p>Gets folder with ID :id</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-foldersidnotes">GET /folders/:id/notes<a href="#get-foldersidnotes" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /folders/:id/notes" title="Direct link to GET /folders/:id/notes">​</a></h3><p>Gets all the notes inside this folder.</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="post-folders">POST /folders<a href="#post-folders" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to POST /folders" title="Direct link to POST /folders">​</a></h3><p>Creates a new folder</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="put-foldersid">PUT /folders/:id<a href="#put-foldersid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to PUT /folders/:id" title="Direct link to PUT /folders/:id">​</a></h3><p>Sets the properties of the folder with ID :id</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="delete-foldersid">DELETE /folders/:id<a href="#delete-foldersid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to DELETE /folders/:id" title="Direct link to DELETE /folders/:id">​</a></h3><p>Deletes the folder with ID :id</p><p>By default, the folder will be moved <strong>to the trash</strong>. To permanently delete it, add the query parameter <code>permanent=1</code></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="resources">Resources<a href="#resources" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Resources" title="Direct link to Resources">​</a></h2><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="properties-2">Properties<a href="#properties-2" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Properties" title="Direct link to Properties">​</a></h3><table><thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Type</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>id</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>title</td><td>text</td><td>The resource title.</td></tr><tr><td>mime</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>filename</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>created_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the resource was created.</td></tr><tr><td>updated_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the resource was last updated.</td></tr><tr><td>user_created_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the resource was created. It may differ from created_time as it can be manually set by the user.</td></tr><tr><td>user_updated_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the resource was last updated. It may differ from updated_time as it can be manually set by the user.</td></tr><tr><td>file_extension</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>encryption_cipher_text</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>encryption_applied</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>encryption_blob_encrypted</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>size</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>is_shared</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>share_id</td><td>text</td><td>The ID of the Joplin Server/Cloud share containing the resource. Empty if not shared.</td></tr><tr><td>master_key_id</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>user_data</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>blob_updated_time</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>ocr_text</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>ocr_details</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>ocr_status</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>ocr_error</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>ocr_driver_id</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr></tbody></table><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-resources">GET /resources<a href="#get-resources" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /resources" title="Direct link to GET /resources">​</a></h3><p>Gets all resources</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-resourcesid">GET /resources/:id<a href="#get-resourcesid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /resources/:id" title="Direct link to GET /resources/:id">​</a></h3><p>Gets resource with ID :id</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-resourcesidfile">GET /resources/:id/file<a href="#get-resourcesidfile" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /resources/:id/file" title="Direct link to GET /resources/:id/file">​</a></h3><p>Gets the actual file associated with this resource.</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-resourcesidnotes">GET /resources/:id/notes<a href="#get-resourcesidnotes" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /resources/:id/notes" title="Direct link to GET /resources/:id/notes">​</a></h3><p>Gets the notes (IDs) associated with a resource.</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="post-resources">POST /resources<a href="#post-resources" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to POST /resources" title="Direct link to POST /resources">​</a></h3><p>Creates a new resource</p><p>Creating a new resource is special because you also need to upload the file. Unlike other API calls, this one must have the &quot;multipart/form-data&quot; Content-Type. The file data must be passed to the &quot;data&quot; form field, and the other properties to the &quot;props&quot; form field. An example of a valid call with cURL would be:</p><div class="language-shell codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-shell codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">curl</span><span class="token plain"> -F </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;data=@/path/to/file.jpg&#x27;</span><span class="token plain"> -F </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;props={&quot;title&quot;:&quot;my resource title&quot;}&#x27;</span><span class="token plain"> http://localhost:41184/resources</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>To <strong>update</strong> the resource content, you can make a PUT request with the same arguments:</p><div class="language-shell codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-shell codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">curl</span><span class="token plain"> -X PUT -F </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;data=@/path/to/file.jpg&#x27;</span><span class="token plain"> -F </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;props={&quot;title&quot;:&quot;my modified title&quot;}&#x27;</span><span class="token plain"> http://localhost:41184/resources/8fe1417d7b184324bf6b0122b76c4696</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>The &quot;data&quot; field is required, while the &quot;props&quot; one is not. If not specified, default values will be used.</p><p>Or if you only need to update the resource properties (title, etc.), without changing the content, you can make a regular PUT request:</p><div class="language-shell codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-shell codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token function" style="color:#d73a49">curl</span><span class="token plain"> -X PUT --data </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&#x27;{&quot;title&quot;: &quot;My new title&quot;}&#x27;</span><span class="token plain"> http://localhost:41184/resources/8fe1417d7b184324bf6b0122b76c4696</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p><strong>From a plugin</strong> the syntax to create a resource is also a bit special:</p><div class="language-javascript codeBlockContainer_Ckt0 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_biex"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-javascript codeBlock_bY9V thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_e6Vv"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token keyword control-flow" style="color:#00009f">await</span><span class="token plain"> joplin</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token property-access">data</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">.</span><span class="token method function property-access" style="color:#d73a49">post</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">(</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">[</span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&quot;resources&quot;</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">]</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token keyword null nil" style="color:#00009f">null</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token literal-property property" style="color:#36acaa">title</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&quot;test.jpg&quot;</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// Resource metadata</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">[</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">                </span><span class="token literal-property property" style="color:#36acaa">path</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&quot;/path/to/test.jpg&quot;</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token comment" style="color:#999988;font-style:italic">// Actual file</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">            </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">        </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">]</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">)</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">;</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup__atx"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_eSgA" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_y97N"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_LjdS"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="put-resourcesid">PUT /resources/:id<a href="#put-resourcesid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to PUT /resources/:id" title="Direct link to PUT /resources/:id">​</a></h3><p>Sets the properties of the resource with ID :id</p><p>You may also update the file data by specifying a file (See <code>POST /resources</code> example).</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="delete-resourcesid">DELETE /resources/:id<a href="#delete-resourcesid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to DELETE /resources/:id" title="Direct link to DELETE /resources/:id">​</a></h3><p>Deletes the resource with ID :id</p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="tags">Tags<a href="#tags" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Tags" title="Direct link to Tags">​</a></h2><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="properties-3">Properties<a href="#properties-3" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Properties" title="Direct link to Properties">​</a></h3><table><thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Type</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>id</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>title</td><td>text</td><td>The tag title.</td></tr><tr><td>created_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the tag was created.</td></tr><tr><td>updated_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the tag was last updated.</td></tr><tr><td>user_created_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the tag was created. It may differ from created_time as it can be manually set by the user.</td></tr><tr><td>user_updated_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the tag was last updated. It may differ from updated_time as it can be manually set by the user.</td></tr><tr><td>encryption_cipher_text</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>encryption_applied</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>is_shared</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>parent_id</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>user_data</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr></tbody></table><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-tags">GET /tags<a href="#get-tags" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /tags" title="Direct link to GET /tags">​</a></h3><p>Gets all tags</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-tagsid">GET /tags/:id<a href="#get-tagsid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /tags/:id" title="Direct link to GET /tags/:id">​</a></h3><p>Gets tag with ID :id</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-tagsidnotes">GET /tags/:id/notes<a href="#get-tagsidnotes" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /tags/:id/notes" title="Direct link to GET /tags/:id/notes">​</a></h3><p>Gets all the notes with this tag.</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="post-tags">POST /tags<a href="#post-tags" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to POST /tags" title="Direct link to POST /tags">​</a></h3><p>Creates a new tag</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="post-tagsidnotes">POST /tags/:id/notes<a href="#post-tagsidnotes" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to POST /tags/:id/notes" title="Direct link to POST /tags/:id/notes">​</a></h3><p>Post a note to this endpoint to add the tag to the note. The note data must at least contain an ID property (all other properties will be ignored).</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="put-tagsid">PUT /tags/:id<a href="#put-tagsid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to PUT /tags/:id" title="Direct link to PUT /tags/:id">​</a></h3><p>Sets the properties of the tag with ID :id</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="delete-tagsid">DELETE /tags/:id<a href="#delete-tagsid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to DELETE /tags/:id" title="Direct link to DELETE /tags/:id">​</a></h3><p>Deletes the tag with ID :id</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="delete-tagsidnotesnote_id">DELETE /tags/:id/notes/:note_id<a href="#delete-tagsidnotesnote_id" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to DELETE /tags/:id/notes/:note_id" title="Direct link to DELETE /tags/:id/notes/:note_id">​</a></h3><p>Remove the tag from the note.</p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="revisions">Revisions<a href="#revisions" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Revisions" title="Direct link to Revisions">​</a></h2><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="properties-4">Properties<a href="#properties-4" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Properties" title="Direct link to Properties">​</a></h3><table><thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Type</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>id</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>parent_id</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>item_type</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>item_id</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>item_updated_time</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>title_diff</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>body_diff</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>metadata_diff</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>encryption_cipher_text</td><td>text</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>encryption_applied</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>updated_time</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>created_time</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr></tbody></table><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-revisions">GET /revisions<a href="#get-revisions" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /revisions" title="Direct link to GET /revisions">​</a></h3><p>Gets all revisions</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-revisionsid">GET /revisions/:id<a href="#get-revisionsid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /revisions/:id" title="Direct link to GET /revisions/:id">​</a></h3><p>Gets revision with ID :id</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="post-revisions">POST /revisions<a href="#post-revisions" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to POST /revisions" title="Direct link to POST /revisions">​</a></h3><p>Creates a new revision</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="put-revisionsid">PUT /revisions/:id<a href="#put-revisionsid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to PUT /revisions/:id" title="Direct link to PUT /revisions/:id">​</a></h3><p>Sets the properties of the revision with ID :id</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="delete-revisionsid">DELETE /revisions/:id<a href="#delete-revisionsid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to DELETE /revisions/:id" title="Direct link to DELETE /revisions/:id">​</a></h3><p>Deletes the revision with ID :id</p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="events">Events<a href="#events" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Events" title="Direct link to Events">​</a></h2><p>This end point can be used to retrieve the latest note changes. Currently only note changes are tracked.</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="properties-5">Properties<a href="#properties-5" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Properties" title="Direct link to Properties">​</a></h3><table><thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Type</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>id</td><td>int</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>item_type</td><td>int</td><td>The item type (see table above for the list of item types)</td></tr><tr><td>item_id</td><td>text</td><td>The item ID</td></tr><tr><td>type</td><td>int</td><td>The type of change - either 1 (created), 2 (updated) or 3 (deleted)</td></tr><tr><td>created_time</td><td>int</td><td>When the event was generated</td></tr><tr><td>source</td><td>int</td><td>Unused</td></tr><tr><td>before_change_item</td><td>text</td><td>Unused</td></tr></tbody></table><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-events">GET /events<a href="#get-events" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /events" title="Direct link to GET /events">​</a></h3><p>Returns a paginated list of recent events. A <code>cursor</code> property should be provided, which tells from what point in time the events should be returned. The API will return a <code>cursor</code> property, to tell from where to resume retrieving events, as well as an <code>has_more</code> (tells if more changes can be retrieved) and <code>items</code> property, which will contain the list of events. Events are kept for up to 90 days.</p><p>If no <code>cursor</code> property is provided, the API will respond with the latest change ID. That can be used to retrieve future events later on.</p><p>The results are paginated so you may need multiple calls to retrieve all the events. Use the <code>has_more</code> property to know if more can be retrieved.</p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7" id="get-eventsid">GET /events/:id<a href="#get-eventsid" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to GET /events/:id" title="Direct link to GET /events/:id">​</a></h3><p>Returns the event with the given ID.</p></div><footer class="theme-doc-footer docusaurus-mt-lg"><div href="#properties-1" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">Properties</a></li><li><a href="#get-folders" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">GET /folders</a></li><li><a /folders/:id/notes</a></li><li><a href="#post-folders" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">POST /folders</a></li><li><a href="#put-foldersid" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">PUT /folders/:id</a></li><li><a href="#delete-foldersid" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">DELETE /folders/:id</a></li></ul></li><li><a href="#resources" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">Resources</a><ul><li><a href="#properties-2" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">Properties</a></li><li><a href="#get-resources" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">GET /resources</a></li><li><a href="#get-resourcesid" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">GET /resources/:id</a></li><li><a href="#get-resourcesidfile" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">GET /resources/:id/file</a></li><li><a href="#get-resourcesidnotes" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">GET /resources/:id/notes</a></li><li><a href="#post-resources" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">POST /resources</a></li><li><a href="#put-resourcesid" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">PUT /resources/:id</a></li><li><a href="#delete-resourcesid" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">DELETE /resources/:id</a></li></ul></li><li><a href="#tags" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">Tags</a><ul><li><a href="#properties-3" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">Properties</a></li><li><a href="#get-tags" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">GET /tags</a></li><li><a href="#get-tagsid" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">GET /tags/:id</a></li><li><a href="#get-tagsidnotes" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">GET /tags/:id/notes</a></li><li><a href="#post-tags" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">POST /tags</a></li><li><a href="#post-tagsidnotes" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">POST /tags/:id/notes</a></li><li><a href="#put-tagsid" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">PUT /tags/:id</a></li><li><a href="#delete-tagsid" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">DELETE /tags/:id</a></li><li><a href="#delete-tagsidnotesnote_id" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">DELETE /tags/:id/notes/:note_id</a></li></ul></li><li><a href="#revisions" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">Revisions</a><ul><li><a href="#properties-4" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">Properties</a></li><li><a href="#get-revisions" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">GET /revisions</a></li><li><a href="#get-revisionsid" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">GET /revisions/:id</a></li><li><a href="#post-revisions" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">POST /revisions</a></li><li><a href="#put-revisionsid" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">PUT /revisions/:id</a></li><li><a href="#delete-revisionsid" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">DELETE /revisions/:id</a></li></ul></li><li><a href="#events" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">Events</a><ul><li><a href="#properties-5" class="table-of-contents__link toc-highlight">Properties</a></li><li><a href="#get-events" /events/:id</a></li></ul></li></ul></div></div></div></div></main></div></div><footer class="footer footer--dark"><div class="container container-fluid"><div class="row footer__links"><div class="col src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/GitHub-Badge.svg" alt="Sponsor on GitHub" class="img_ev3q"></a> <a href="https://www.patreon.com/joplin" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img loading="lazy" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/Patreon-Badge.svg" alt="Become a patron" class="img_ev3q"></a> <a href="https://joplinapp.org/donate/#donations" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img loading="lazy" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/Donate-IBAN.svg" alt="Donate using IBAN" class="img_ev3q"></a></p></div><p>When experimenting with Joplin, for example when <a href="/help/api/get_started/plugins">developing a plugin</a> or trying a theme, you might want to run Joplin in development mode. Doing this will open a second copy of Joplin using a different profile with test notes and notebooks, so you can experiment without risking changing or deleting your data.</p><p>To enable Development Mode, go to <strong>Help <!-- -->&gt;<!-- --> Copy dev mode command to clipboard</strong>. This will copy a command to your clipboard. Paste this command in a shell / terminal to run a development version of the app.</p></div><footer class="theme-doc-footer docusaurus-mt-lg"><div class="theme-doc-footer-edit-meta-row row"><div 1.2z m-29.5 17.1l18.4-18.5 6.3 6.3-18.4 18.4h-6.3v-6.2z"></path></g></svg>Edit this page</a></div><div class="col lastUpdated_vwxv"></div></div></footer></article><nav class="pagination-nav docItemCol_VOVn"><div class="docItemContainer_Djhp"><article><div class="theme-doc-markdown markdown"><h1>Plugin Loading Rules</h1><div class="donate-links"><p><a href="https://www.paypal.com/donate/?business=E8JMYD2LQ8MMA&amp;no_recurring=0&amp;item_name=I+rely+on+donations+to+maintain+and+improve+the+Joplin+open+source+project.+Thank+you+for+your+help+-+it+makes+a+difference%21&amp;currency_code=EUR" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img loading="lazy" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/Donate-PayPal-green.svg" alt="Donate using PayPal" class="img_ev3q"></a> <a href="https://github.com/sponsors/laurent22/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img loading="lazy" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/GitHub-Badge.svg" alt="Sponsor on GitHub" class="img_ev3q"></a> <a href="https://www.patreon.com/joplin" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img loading="lazy" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/Patreon-Badge.svg" alt="Become a patron" class="img_ev3q"></a> <a href="https://joplinapp.org/donate/#donations" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img loading="lazy" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laurent22/joplin/dev/Assets/WebsiteAssets/images/badges/Donate-IBAN.svg" alt="Donate using IBAN" class="img_ev3q"></a></p></div><p>When loading plugins from the profile <code>plugins</code> directory, Joplin will look at the following locations:</p><ul><li><code>plugins/PLUGIN_ID.js</code></li><li><code>plugins/PLUGIN_ID/index.js</code></li><li><code>plugins/PLUGIN_ID/dist/index.js</code></li><li>Any directory or file that starts with &quot;_&quot; will be excluded. This can be used to disable a plugin without having to delete it from the directory.</li></ul><p><code>PLUGIN_ID</code> can be any string but it must be unique.</p></div><footer class="theme-doc-footer docusaurus-mt-lg"><div class="theme-doc-footer-edit-meta-row row"><div class="col"><a href="https://github.com/laurent22/joplin/tree/dev/readme/api/references/plugin_loading_rules.md" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="theme-edit-this-page"><svg fill="currentColor" height="20" width="20" viewBox="0 0 40 40" class="iconEdit_Z9Sw" aria-hidden="true"><g><path d="m34.5 11.7l-3 3.1-6.3-6.3 3.1-3q0.5-0.5 1.2-0.5t1.1 0.5l3.9 3.9q0.5 0.4 0.5 1.1t-0.5 1.2z m-29.5 17.1l18.4-18.5 6.3 6.3-18.4 18.4h-6.3v-6.2z"></path></g></svg>Edit this page</a></div><div class="col lastUpdated_vwxv"></div></div></footer></article><nav class="pagination-nav docusaurus-mt-lg"
