				</section>
				<section class="tsd-panel tsd-member tsd-kind-type-alias">
					<a name="listrendererdependency" class="tsd-anchor"></a>
					<h3>List<wbr>Renderer<wbr>Dependency</h3>
					<div class="tsd-signature tsd-kind-icon">List<wbr>Renderer<wbr>Dependency<span class="tsd-signature-symbol">:</span> <a href="globals.html#listrendererdatabasedependency" class="tsd-signature-type">ListRendererDatabaseDependency</a><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.index"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.selected"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.size.height"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.size.width"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.folder.title"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.isWatched"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.tags"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.todoStatusText"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.titleHtml"</span></div>
					<aside class="tsd-sources">
					</aside>
					<div class="tsd-comment tsd-typography">
						<div class="lead">
							<p>Most of these are the built-in note properties, such as <code>note.title</code>, <code>note.todo_completed</code>, etc.
								complemented with special properties such as <code>note.isWatched</code>, to know if a note is currently
							opened in the external editor, and <code>note.tags</code> to get the list tags associated with the note.</p>
						</div>
						<p>The <code>note.todoStatusText</code> property is a localised description of the to-do status (e.g.
							&quot;to-do, incomplete&quot;). If you include an <code>&lt;input type=&#39;checkbox&#39; ... /&gt;</code> for to-do items that would
						otherwise be unlabelled, consider adding <code>note.todoStatusText</code> as the checkbox&#39;s <code>aria-label</code>.</p>
						<a href="#item-properties" id="item-properties" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: none;">
							<h2>Item properties</h2>
						</a>
						<p>The <code>item.*</code> properties are specific to the rendered item. The most important being
						<code>item.selected</code>, which you can use to display the selected note in a different way.</p>
					</div>
				</section>
				<section class="tsd-panel tsd-member tsd-kind-type-alias">
					<a name="listrendereritemvaluetemplates" class="tsd-anchor"></a>
					<h3>List<wbr>Renderer<wbr>Item<wbr>Value<wbr>Templates</h3>
					<div class="tsd-signature tsd-kind-icon">List<wbr>Renderer<wbr>Item<wbr>Value<wbr>Templates<span class="tsd-signature-symbol">:</span> <span class="tsd-signature-type">Record</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol">&lt;</span><span class="tsd-signature-type">string</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol">, </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">string</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol">&gt;</span></div>
					<aside class="tsd-sources">
					</aside>
				</section>

				<section class="tsd-panel tsd-member tsd-kind-type-alias">
					<a name="path" class="tsd-anchor"></a>
					<h3>Path</h3>
					<div class="tsd-signature tsd-kind-icon">Path<span class="tsd-signature-symbol">:</span> <span class="tsd-signature-type">string</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol">[]</span></div>
					<aside class="tsd-sources">
					</aside>
					<div class="tsd-comment tsd-typography">
						<div class="lead">
							<p>An array of at least one element and at most three elements.</p>
						</div>
						<ul>
							<li><strong>[0]</strong>: Resource name (eg. &quot;notes&quot;, &quot;folders&quot;, &quot;tags&quot;, etc.)</li>
							<li><strong>[1]</strong>: (Optional) Resource ID.</li>
							<li><strong>[2]</strong>: (Optional) Resource link.</li>
						</ul>
					</div>
				</section>

				<section class="tsd-panel tsd-member tsd-kind-type-alias tsd-has-type-parameter">
					<a name="workspaceeventhandler" class="tsd-anchor"></a>
					<h3>Workspace<wbr>Event<wbr>Handler</h3>

line&#x27;,&#x27;plugin.azamahJunior.note-statistics&#x27;,&#x27;plugin.calebjohn.MathMode&#x27;,&#x27;plugin.calebjohn.rich-markdown&#x27;,]</span></div>

				<section class="tsd-panel tsd-member tsd-kind-type-alias">
					<a name="listrendererdependency" class="tsd-anchor"></a>
					<h3>List<wbr>Renderer<wbr>Dependency</h3>
					<div class="tsd-signature tsd-kind-icon">List<wbr>Renderer<wbr>Dependency<span class="tsd-signature-symbol">:</span> <a href="globals.html#listrendererdatabasedependency" class="tsd-signature-type">ListRendererDatabaseDependency</a><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.index"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.selected"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.size.height"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.size.width"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.folder.title"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.isWatched"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.tags"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.todoStatusText"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.titleHtml"</span></div>
					<aside class="tsd-sources">
					</aside>
					<div class="tsd-comment tsd-typography">
						<div class="lead">
							<p>Most of these are the built-in note properties, such as <code>note.title</code>, <code>note.todo_completed</code>, etc.
								complemented with special properties such as <code>note.isWatched</code>, to know if a note is currently
							opened in the external editor, and <code>note.tags</code> to get the list tags associated with the note.</p>
						</div>
						<p>The <code>note.todoStatusText</code> property is a localised description of the to-do status (e.g.
							&quot;to-do, incomplete&quot;). If you include an <code>&lt;input type=&#39;checkbox&#39; ... /&gt;</code> for to-do items that would
						otherwise be unlabelled, consider adding <code>note.todoStatusText</code> as the checkbox&#39;s <code>aria-label</code>.</p>
						<a href="#item-properties" id="item-properties" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: none;">
							<h2>Item properties</h2>
						</a>
						<p>The <code>item.*</code> properties are specific to the rendered item. The most important being
						<code>item.selected</code>, which you can use to display the selected note in a different way.</p>
					</div>
				</section>
				<section class="tsd-panel tsd-member tsd-kind-type-alias">
					<a name="listrendereritemvaluetemplates" class="tsd-anchor"></a>

					</aside>
				</section>

					<a name="path" class="tsd-anchor"></a>
					<h3>Path</h3>
					<div class="tsd-signature tsd-kind-icon">Path<span class="tsd-signature-symbol">:</span> <span class="tsd-signature-type">string</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol">[]</span></div>
					<aside class="tsd-sources">
					</aside>
					<div class="tsd-comment tsd-typography">
						<div class="lead">
							<p>An array of at least one element and at most three elements.</p>
						</div>
						<ul>
							<li><strong>[0]</strong>: Resource name (eg. &quot;notes&quot;, &quot;folders&quot;, &quot;tags&quot;, etc.)</li>
							<li><strong>[1]</strong>: (Optional) Resource ID.</li>
							<li><strong>[2]</strong>: (Optional) Resource link.</li>
						</ul>
					</div>
				</section>

					<div class="tsd-signature tsd-kind-icon">View<wbr>Handle<span class="tsd-signature-symbol">:</span> <span class="tsd-signature-type">string</span></div>
					<aside class="tsd-sources">

line&#x27;,&#x27;plugin.azamahJunior.note-statistics&#x27;,&#x27;plugin.calebjohn.MathMode&#x27;,&#x27;plugin.calebjohn.rich-markdown&#x27;,]</span></div>

class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.user_updated_time"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.type_"</span></div>
					<aside class="tsd-sources">
					</aside>
				</section>
				<section class="tsd-panel tsd-member tsd-kind-type-alias">
					<a name="listrendererdependency" class="tsd-anchor"></a>
					<h3>List<wbr>Renderer<wbr>Dependency</h3>
					<div class="tsd-signature tsd-kind-icon">List<wbr>Renderer<wbr>Dependency<span class="tsd-signature-symbol">:</span> <a href="globals.html#listrendererdatabasedependency" class="tsd-signature-type">ListRendererDatabaseDependency</a><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.index"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.selected"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.size.height"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.size.width"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.folder.title"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.isWatched"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.tags"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.todoStatusText"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.titleHtml"</span></div>
					<aside class="tsd-sources">
					</aside>
					<div class="tsd-comment tsd-typography">
						<div class="lead">
							<p>Most of these are the built-in note properties, such as <code>note.title</code>, <code>note.todo_completed</code>, etc.
								complemented with special properties such as <code>note.isWatched</code>, to know if a note is currently
							opened in the external editor, and <code>note.tags</code> to get the list tags associated with the note.</p>
						</div>
						<p>The <code>note.todoStatusText</code> property is a localised description of the to-do status (e.g.
							&quot;to-do, incomplete&quot;). If you include an <code>&lt;input type=&#39;checkbox&#39; ... /&gt;</code> for to-do items that would
						otherwise be unlabelled, consider adding <code>note.todoStatusText</code> as the checkbox&#39;s <code>aria-label</code>.</p>
						<a href="#item-properties" id="item-properties" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: none;">
							<h2>Item properties</h2>
						</a>
						<p>The <code>item.*</code> properties are specific to the rendered item. The most important being
						<code>item.selected</code>, which you can use to display the selected note in a different way.</p>
					</div>
				</section>
				<section class="tsd-panel tsd-member tsd-kind-type-alias">
					<a name="listrendereritemvaluetemplates" class="tsd-anchor"></a>
					<h3>List<wbr>Renderer<wbr>Item<wbr>Value<wbr>Templates</h3>

					<aside class="tsd-sources">
					</aside>
				</section>

					<h3>Path</h3>
					<div class="tsd-signature tsd-kind-icon">Path<span class="tsd-signature-symbol">:</span> <span class="tsd-signature-type">string</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol">[]</span></div>
					<aside class="tsd-sources">
					</aside>
					<div class="tsd-comment tsd-typography">
						<div class="lead">
							<p>An array of at least one element and at most three elements.</p>
						</div>
						<ul>
							<li><strong>[0]</strong>: Resource name (eg. &quot;notes&quot;, &quot;folders&quot;, &quot;tags&quot;, etc.)</li>
							<li><strong>[1]</strong>: (Optional) Resource ID.</li>
							<li><strong>[2]</strong>: (Optional) Resource link.</li>
						</ul>
					</div>

			<section class="tsd-panel-group tsd-member-group ">
				<h2>Variables</h2>
				<section class="tsd-panel tsd-member tsd-kind-variable">
					<a name="columnnames" class="tsd-anchor"></a>

line&#x27;,&#x27;plugin.azamahJunior.note-statistics&#x27;,&#x27;plugin.calebjohn.MathMode&#x27;,&#x27;plugin.calebjohn.rich-markdown&#x27;,]</span></div>

class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.conflict_original_id"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.created_time"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.deleted_time"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.encryption_applied"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.encryption_cipher_text"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.id"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.is_conflict"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.is_shared"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.is_todo"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.latitude"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.longitude"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.markup_language"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.master_key_id"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.order"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.parent_id"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.share_id"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.source"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.source_application"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.user_updated_time"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.type_"</span></div>
					<aside class="tsd-sources">
					</aside>
				</section>
				<section class="tsd-panel tsd-member tsd-kind-type-alias">
					<a name="listrendererdependency" class="tsd-anchor"></a>
					<h3>List<wbr>Renderer<wbr>Dependency</h3>
					<div class="tsd-signature tsd-kind-icon">List<wbr>Renderer<wbr>Dependency<span class="tsd-signature-symbol">:</span> <a href="globals.html#listrendererdatabasedependency" class="tsd-signature-type">ListRendererDatabaseDependency</a><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.index"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.selected"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.size.height"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"item.size.width"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.folder.title"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.isWatched"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.tags"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.todoStatusText"</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> | </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">"note.titleHtml"</span></div>
					<aside class="tsd-sources">
					</aside>
					<div class="tsd-comment tsd-typography">
						<div class="lead">
							<p>Most of these are the built-in note properties, such as <code>note.title</code>, <code>note.todo_completed</code>, etc.
								complemented with special properties such as <code>note.isWatched</code>, to know if a note is currently
							opened in the external editor, and <code>note.tags</code> to get the list tags associated with the note.</p>
						</div>
						<p>The <code>note.todoStatusText</code> property is a localised description of the to-do status (e.g.
							&quot;to-do, incomplete&quot;). If you include an <code>&lt;input type=&#39;checkbox&#39; ... /&gt;</code> for to-do items that would
						otherwise be unlabelled, consider adding <code>note.todoStatusText</code> as the checkbox&#39;s <code>aria-label</code>.</p>
						<a href="#item-properties" id="item-properties" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: none;">
							<h2>Item properties</h2>
						</a>
						<p>The <code>item.*</code> properties are specific to the rendered item. The most important being
						<code>item.selected</code>, which you can use to display the selected note in a different way.</p>
					</div>
				</section>
				<section class="tsd-panel tsd-member tsd-kind-type-alias">
					<a name="listrendereritemvaluetemplates" class="tsd-anchor"></a>
					<h3>List<wbr>Renderer<wbr>Item<wbr>Value<wbr>Templates</h3>
					<div class="tsd-signature tsd-kind-icon">List<wbr>Renderer<wbr>Item<wbr>Value<wbr>Templates<span class="tsd-signature-symbol">:</span> <span class="tsd-signature-type">Record</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol">&lt;</span><span class="tsd-signature-type">string</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol">, </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">string</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol">&gt;</span></div>
					<aside class="tsd-sources">
					</aside>
				</section>

				<section class="tsd-panel tsd-member tsd-kind-type-alias">
					<a name="path" class="tsd-anchor"></a>
					<h3>Path</h3>
					<div class="tsd-signature tsd-kind-icon">Path<span class="tsd-signature-symbol">:</span> <span class="tsd-signature-type">string</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol">[]</span></div>
					<aside class="tsd-sources">
					</aside>
					<div class="tsd-comment tsd-typography">
						<div class="lead">
							<p>An array of at least one element and at most three elements.</p>
						</div>
						<ul>
							<li><strong>[0]</strong>: Resource name (eg. &quot;notes&quot;, &quot;folders&quot;, &quot;tags&quot;, etc.)</li>
							<li><strong>[1]</strong>: (Optional) Resource ID.</li>
							<li><strong>[2]</strong>: (Optional) Resource link.</li>
						</ul>
					</div>
				</section>

				<section class="tsd-panel tsd-member tsd-kind-type-alias tsd-has-type-parameter">
					<a name="workspaceeventhandler" class="tsd-anchor"></a>
					<h3>Workspace<wbr>Event<wbr>Handler</h3>
					<div class="tsd-signature tsd-kind-icon">Workspace<wbr>Event<wbr>Handler&lt;EventType&gt;<span class="tsd-signature-symbol">:</span> <span class="tsd-signature-symbol">(</span>event<span class="tsd-signature-symbol">: </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">EventType</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol">)</span><span class="tsd-signature-symbol"> =&gt; </span><span class="tsd-signature-type">void</span></div>

line&#x27;,&#x27;plugin.azamahJunior.note-statistics&#x27;,&#x27;plugin.calebjohn.MathMode&#x27;,&#x27;plugin.calebjohn.rich-markdown&#x27;,]</span></div>

          </p>
</form>        </div>

        <div data-target="custom-scopes.manageCustomScopesForm">
          <div data-target="custom-scopes.list"></div>
        </div>

</div>
      </scrollable-region>
      <div data-view-component="true" class="Overlay-footer Overlay-footer--alignEnd Overlay-footer--divided">          <button data-action="click:custom-scopes#customScopesCancel" type="button" data-view-component="true" class="btn">    Cancel
</button>
          <button form="custom-scopes-dialog-form" data-action="click:custom-scopes#customScopesSubmit" data-target="custom-scopes.customScopesSubmitButton" type="submit" data-view-component="true" class="btn-primary btn">    Create saved search
</button>
</div>
</dialog></dialog-helper>
    </custom-scopes>
  </div>
</qbsearch-input>

  app-name="react-code-view"
